title: Battery indicator stuck after Jan. 2021
content:
After installing the January 2021 update, the battery indicator on my Pixel 3 is stuck at 56%
The batty itself seems fine, it charges and holds a charge fine, as usual, but the percentage indicator is stuck at 56%, so it doesn't go into battery saving, it shuts off "suddenly", and I don't know when it's charged.

It began immediately after rebooting to install the update, so I'm hoping it can be fixed by another update. Does anyone have the same issue?
